summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over portions of Tracts 17 and 18, Meridian Avenue Acres (Tract 18, Meridian Avenue Acres - between Densmore Avenue North and Wallingford Avenue North; Storm Drain); and over portions of Block 8, Jefferson park Addition Division No. 2 (Alley, Block 10, Jefferson park Addition Division No. 2; Storm Drain) for storm drain purposes.
